	texture = "gfx/interface/icons/production_method_icons/wooden_buildings.dds"
	is_default = yes
	country_modifiers = {
		workforce_scaled = {
			country_construction_add = 0.2
		}
	}
	building_modifiers = {
		workforce_scaled = {
			goods_input_fabric_add = 7.5
			goods_input_wood_add = 22.5
		}
		level_scaled = {
			building_employment_bureaucrats_add = 10
			building_employment_clerks_add = 10
			building_employment_laborers_add = 80
		}
		unscaled = {
			building_laborers_mortality_mult = 0.1
		}
	}
	state_modifiers = {
		workforce_scaled = {
			state_construction_mult = 0
		}
	}
}
